ingredients.ingredient: 4 tablespoons cinnamon bun topping (such as Popcorn Powder)

cookingTips: Separate the crescent rolls along their perforations and brush each piece with melted butter
Sprinkle the cinnamon bun topping and chocolate chips before rolling to create pockets of flavor
Bake at 375°F for 10-12 minutes until golden brown and crispy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the baker create a quick indulgent treat using convenience products with added mix-ins for personalization and flavor.
